Patterns

  • User login

Expansion panels

Use expansion panels to contain content and save space on a page.

  1. Read more expansion
  2. Heading expansion

1. Read more expansion

Use the read more expansion when you want to hide a large chunk of text when space is at a premium.

Heading 1

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Sed pharetra est id elit auctor tristique. Aliquam vestibulum gravida mi eu ornare. Aenean tristique ac leo at eleifend. Class aptent taciti sociosqu ad litora torquent per conubia nostra, per inceptos himenaeos. In hac habitasse platea dictumst.

Morbi tempus tortor eu massa pharetra efficitur. Aenean hendrerit tellus eu condimentum dapibus. In egestas nibh at sapien pellentesque congue. Nam pulvinar neque vitae risus sagittis, vel iaculis diam condimentum. Fusce mollis id est vel suscipit. Aenean ut eleifend libero. Duis dui urna, ultricies vitae porttitor vitae, sodales a massa. Sed dictum mattis diam quis ultricies.

HTML injected here
Angular example usage:
<app-readmore heading="Heading 1" initialExpanded="false"><div>Intro text></div><div>Read more text></div></app-readmore>

1. Heading expansion

Use the heading expansion when you want to hide a large chunk of text when space is at a premium.

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Sed pharetra est id elit auctor tristique. Aliquam vestibulum gravida mi eu ornare. Aenean tristique ac leo at eleifend. Class aptent taciti sociosqu ad litora torquent per conubia nostra, per inceptos himenaeos. In hac habitasse platea dictumst.

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Sed pharetra est id elit auctor tristique. Aliquam vestibulum gravida mi eu ornare. Aenean tristique ac leo at eleifend. Class aptent taciti sociosqu ad litora torquent per conubia nostra, per inceptos himenaeos. In hac habitasse platea dictumst.

HTML injected here
Angular example usage:
<app-expansion heading="Heading 1" initialExpanded="false">Main text</app-expansion> <app-expansion heading="Heading 2" initialExpanded="false">Main text</app-expansion>
